title: Son of Rambow
description: The debut short film from Carter & Proudfoot, described as an homage to First Blood.
quote: They took my father, Trautman. They drew first blood.
creator: Carter & Proudfoot
altHero: Will Proudfoot with a Rambo-style headband, slamming his fist on a desk
alt2: the two boys look up at the sky
alt3: Will talks with his brother, also dressed like Rambo
alt4: an old man tied up with a fake bomb
